type: Emergency Supplies for Fraser Valley and Interior Tax Services Office
short_summary: Emergency Supplies for Fraser Valley and Interior Tax Services Office
description: This requirement is for three CRA locations as part of the FVITSO: Site 1 - Surrey, Site 2 - Penticton and Site 3 - Kelowna. The Contractor must remove and provide offsite disposal for expired Food & Water Rations, and survival and first aid modules located within the Earthquake Emergency Cabinets, and must supply deliver and install new replacement modules in the designated earthquake cabinets.
duration_in_months: Soidequate for Suppliers regarding 30 Months Sided Add indication There January technical
